alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and southern Camden Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Marys to near Kings Ferry. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Kings Bay Base, Kings Ferry, Cumberland Island and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
